title: SET_GAMEPLAY_CAM_RELATIVE_PITCH
content:
0x6D0858B8EDFD2B7D0x6381B963// SetGameplayCamRelativePitch
void SET_GAMEPLAY_CAM_RELATIVE_PITCH(float angle, float scalingFactor);Parameters:angle: the angle to rotate the camera byscalingFactor: always seems to be set to 1.0 in native callsThis native sets the camera's pitch (rotation on the x-axis).
codeBlocks:
// SetGameplayCamRelativePitch
void SET_GAMEPLAY_CAM_RELATIVE_PITCH(float angle, float scalingFactor);
